subject: Baseball
Surgery and Surgeons
lead_paragraph: A team physician has recommended elbow surgery to repair a partly torn medial collateral ligament for pitcher Jeremy Hefner, who was a key member of the Mets’ rotation earlier this season.
snippet: A team physician has recommended elbow surgery to repair a partly torn medial collateral ligament for pitcher Jeremy Hefner, who was a key member of the Mets’ rotation earlier this season.
